question: When my almost 3 year old son drinks a full sippy cup of juice(half water) in one quick sitting he usually urinates about 3 times in the next hour and a half.  And its ALOT of clear urine...its not like he isnt emptying his bladder all the way.  Other than that if he just sips through out the day he urinates normal.  He doesnt show signs of excessive thirst or hunger.  Sound like diabetes?  He has his 3year old check up coming up so I will bring it up to the doctor.  I jsut thought I would see what others think.
title: Could my toddler have diabetes?
